title: (x) Looking for ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ alternate characters {Yves}
content:
Hey Type Masters. I'm looking for a specific type of the Avante Garde Gothic typeface. Everywhere I've looked that has this typeface doesn't include the vertical stemmed V and W and a few other complex letter forms that I'm looking for. If anyone knows where I can find the version of Avant Gard Gothic included in this linked pic and could let me know it would be great.

[http://bowfinprintworks.com/Fonts/FontScans/AvantGardeGothBd.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141111031116/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Fonts/FontScans/AvantGardeGothBd.gif "http://bowfinprintworks.com/Fonts/FontScans/AvantGardeGothBd.gif")
author: TwoE

comments.content: Ok, why I can't view Bald's link?

You can right-click, choose properties, and find that it is [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141111031116/http:/typophile.com/node/18213)

Edit: I knew I should have checked first, it's a circular link to this thread :o

I've posted a more complete page with the two [Avant Garde Gothic Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20141111031116/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/itc_avant_garde_gothic_alternate/) versions (ITC and E+F).
